entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:14 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 03:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Wet snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Wet snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Periods of rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along parts of the coast. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 7:27 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
